trans-unit.source: A property should determine its property content serialization with the DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute, DefaultValueAttribute or the ShouldSerializeProperty method.
trans-unit.target: 属性应使用 DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute、DefaultValueAttribute 或 ShouldSerializeProperty 方法确定其属性内容序列化。

trans-unit.source: Property '{0}' does not configure the code serialization for its property content
trans-unit.target: 属性"{0}"没有为其属性内容配置代码序列化

trans-unit.source: Missing code serialization configuration for property content
trans-unit.target: 缺少属性内容的代码序列化配置

trans-unit.source: Avoid passing a `Func<T>` to `InvokeAsync` where `T` is a `Task` or `ValueTask`, unless your intention is for the delegate to simply be kicked off as an unsupervised task. Instead, use `Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask>` or `Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask<T>>`, so that the delegate passed to `InvokeAsync` can be awaited, allowing exceptions to be properly handled.
trans-unit.target: 避免向`InvokeAsync`传递`Func<T>`，其中`T`是`Task`或`ValueTask`，除非打算将委托作为不受监督的任务启动。请改用 `Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask>` 或 `Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask<T>>`，这样传递给 `InvokeAsync` 的委托就可以被等待，从而正确处理异常。

trans-unit.source: Task is being passed to InvokeAsync without a cancellation token
trans-unit.target: 任务正在传递给 InvokeAsync，但没有取消令牌

trans-unit.source: Task is being passed to InvokeAsync without a cancellation token
trans-unit.target: 任务正在传递给 InvokeAsync，但没有取消令牌
